description:
Parameters for subscribe operations (status_subscribe, setup_subscribe, metrics_subscribe).

Establishes a subscription for real-time updates on configuration or status changes.

# Fields * `path` - Optional path filter (None = subscribe to all changes) * `freq` - Optional update frequency in Hz (metrics_subscribe only)

# Example - Subscribe to all setup changes ```json { "path": null } ```

# Example - Subscribe to specific path ```json { "path": "/audio/output/speaker/1" } ```

# Example - Metrics at 10 Hz ```json { "path": null, "freq": 10.0 } ```

path.description: Optional path to subscribe to (None = subscribe to all)

title: JapiSubscribeParams
